name: Lizargon Beta 0.4.0
description:
Lizargon's (temporary) Manual of Mechanics

Lizargon Beta 0.4.0 marks the point where the game's core mechanics are done! Of course, there will be fixes for any bugs that I find, but in terms of the core programming, the mechanics are done!

Beta 0.4.0 introduces many fixes and tweaks to Lizargon's movement and the new combat mechanics. If you want more information about Lizargon's combat, they are explained in the devlog linked to this build.
